title: Dark Remembrance
description: After her husband's death. Raina believed Logan Thorne, his business partner, visited often because of her son, Danny.When Logan offered marriage, she didn’t take him seriously. Why should he tie himself down because Danny needed a father? Then, in a weak moment, she accepted Logan s proposal—for Danny’s sake, of courseJealousy and bitter memories of the past were driving her and Logan apart until Raina realized that their marriage had nothing to do with Danny, but with their own love for each other!
author: Daphne Clair
